org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DoABCTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DoABCTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITag

    public final class DoABCTag
extends Tag
    Represents a DoABC tag in a SWF file.

    DoABC tag defines a series of bytecodes to be executed. The bytecodes contained within the DoABC tag run in the ActionScript 3.0 virtual machine.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected String description()
      Sub-class can override this method to provide more information when the tag object is printed out.
      byte[] getABCData()
      A block of .abc bytecode to be parsed by the ActionScript 3.0 virtual machine, up to the end of the tag.
      long getFlags()
      A 32-bit flags value, which may contain the following bits set: kDoABCLazyInitializeFlag = 1 Indicates that the ABC block should not be executed immediately, but only parsed.
      String getName()
      The name assigned to the bytecode.
      void setABCData(byte[] abcData)
      Set the ABC bytecode.

    • Method Detail

      • getFlags

        public long getFlags()
        A 32-bit flags value, which may contain the following bits set:
        • kDoABCLazyInitializeFlag = 1 Indicates that the ABC block should not be executed immediately, but only parsed. A later finddef may cause its scripts to execute.
        Returns:
        flag value

      • setFlags

        public void setFlags(long flags)
        Set the flag value.
        Parameters:
        flags - flag value

      • getName

        Returns:
        bytecode's name

        name - bytecode's name

      • getABCData

        public byte[] getABCData()
        A block of .abc bytecode to be parsed by the ActionScript 3.0 virtual machine, up to the end of the tag.
        Returns:
        ABC bytes

      • setABCData

        public void setABCData(byte[] abcData)
